page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF GARETH
page.content:
After school Gareth goes home with his brother for tea.They have sandwiches, cake and crisps.After tea they watch television.
Gareth leaves at 5p.m. to do his paper round _he delivers the local free paper once a week.He earns Â£1.50 for this.He goes straight to Athletic Club for training.Gareth runs in distance races both on road and track.Today he has to run five miles around the valley and do warming up exercises and weight training.
He returns home at 8.30p.m. and watches television as he has his supper.Usually fish and chips or pie. Gareth and his brother go to bed at 10p.m. on school days.
